xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop_description=This schema specifies properties used by Adobe Photoshop.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop_label=Photoshop

xmp_property.name: AuthorsPosition
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/AuthorsPosition_description=Job Title of the person listed in the Creator field
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/AuthorsPosition_label=Author#{rsquo}s Position

xmp_property.name: CaptionWriter
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/CaptionWriter_description=Name of the person involved in writing, editing or correcting the description of the image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/CaptionWriter_label=Caption Writer

xmp_property.name: City
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/City_description=Name of the City pictured in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/City_label=City

xmp_property.name: Country
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Country_description=Name of the Country pictured in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Country_label=Country

xmp_property.name: Credit
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Credit_description=Enter who should be credited when this image is published
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Credit_label=Credit Line

xmp_property.name: DateCreated
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/DateCreated_description=The date the intellectual content of the document was created (rather than the creation date of the physical representation). For example, a photo taken during the American Civil War would have a creation date during that epoch (1861-1865) rather than the date the photo was digitized for archiving.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/DateCreated_label=Date Created

xmp_property.name: Headline
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Headline_description=Brief publishable synopsis or summary of the contents of this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Headline_label=Headline

xmp_property.name: History
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/History_description=The Photoshop History displays an accumulated log of edit history that has been done to the document. The logging capability can be turned on via the PS preference dialog under General>History Log.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/History_label=History

xmp_property.name: Instructions
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Instructions_description=Information about embargoes, or other restrictions not covered by the Rights Usage field
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Instructions_label=Instructions

xmp_property.name: Source
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Source_description=Original owner of the copyright of this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/Source_label=Source

xmp_property.name: State
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/photoshop/State_description=Name of the Province or State pictured in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/photoshop/State_label=State/Province
